snippet.title: The Rogue Prince of Persia Gameplay Trailer - Second Act Update
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam: New biomes, bosses, narrative, and art... nearly a new roguelite! Think you can handle the challenge?
Play now the Early Access 👉 princeofpersia.com/therogue/steam

We’re eager to collaborate with our players to develop the best version of this game possible. Thanks to your feedback, the game has already evolved significantly! Join us to become part of the community, experience more gameplay, and help us shape the game during its early access! ⚔️
 INSTAGRAM: princeofpersia_game
 FACEBOOK: Prince Of Persia
X: @princeofpersia
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/PrinceofPersia

The Rogue Prince of Persia is a 2D fast-paced action-platforming roguelite, developed by Evil Empire.

 Join an engaged community, interact directly with the dev team to create the best possible game experience and enjoy regular content updates.

Check it on Steam ➡️ princeofpersia.com/therogue/steam 

#Ubisoft #PrinceofPersia
